@Stanyer wrote:

if(MySQL.isRegistered(this) == false) {
returnCode = 12;
System.out.println(playerName+" failed to logon because they are not registered.");
appendToLR(playerName+" failed to logon because they are not registered.");
savefile = false;
canSave = false;
disconnected = true;
}
